name: Add Social Media Share Buttons
author: Harpreet Kumar

sections.description:
Add Social Media Share Buttons is a FREE WordPress plugin that adds social media share buttons using shortcodes. These buttons let users share statuses, quotes, etc., on social networks like Facebook, X (Twitter), or WhatsApp.

Usage

Use the shortcode [asmsb]Your quote here[/asmsb] to display a quote with social media sharing buttons.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. For more details, see the GNU General Public License.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the add-social-media-share-buttons folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

Add the shortcode [asmsb]Your quote here[/asmsb] in your post or page content to display a quote with social sharing buttons.

short_description: Add Social Media Share Buttons WordPress plugin, adds social buttons via shortcodes, letting users share content on Facebook, X and WhatsApp.
